** 17 《陽貨篇第十七》

17.1陽貨欲見孔子，¶

曰：¶

召，
子欲往。

曰：¶
「末之也已，¶	KR1d0072_003:7b:7:16:2,KR1g0004_003:23a:8:17:80,KR1g0009_009:3b:2:19:2,KR1h0004_017:12a:3:1:7,KR1h0006_009:5b:7:20:7,KR1h0007_017:3b:9:17:8,KR1h0012_009:3b:1:17:12,KR1h0015_008:2b:7:20:4,KR1h0020_004:18b:1:17:99,KR1h0021_002:3b:3:17:12,KR1h0024_014:6b:5:29:4,KR1h0028_012:7a:11:6:24,KR1h0034_012:8a:3:6:24,KR1h0038_013:5a:5:6:24,KR1h0039_006:12a:10:17:28,KR1h0043_017:11a:4:6:23,KR2o0021_017:6a:4:20:23,KR3a0011_003:3b:3:10:1,KR3a0031_003:8a:6:6:2,KR3a0059_034:45a:5:6:2,KR3a0066_001:15a:7:10:8,KR3a0078_052:13b:6:19:2,KR3j0132_004:10b:3:17:1,KR3k0012_160:9a:10:19:32,KR3k0012_999:9a:10:19:7866,KR3k0013_785:1b:7:16:3,KR3k0025_057:22b:8:18:17,KR3k0051_010:15a:3:12:2,KR4d0363_012:18b:8:19:11,KR4d0398_020:10b:3:17:1
何必公山氏之之也？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-13a>¶	KR1e0037_038:2b:5:15:2,KR1e0052_015:30b:7:9:1,KR1e0057_018:32b:2:7:446,KR1e0065_042:5b:3:12:0,KR1g0004_003:23a:8:21:80,KR1g0009_009:3b:3:1:2,KR1h0004_017:12a:4:1:7,KR1h0005_009:3a:1:10:0,KR1h0006_009:5b:8:3:7,KR1h0007_017:3b:9:21:8,KR1h0007_017:4a:6:5:8,KR1h0012_007:3a:6:13:8,KR1h0012_009:3b:1:21:12,KR1h0015_008:2b:7:24:4,KR1h0017_017:12a:7:21:30,KR1h0019_003:55b:6:21:265,KR1h0020_004:18b:1:21:99,KR1h0021_002:3b:3:21:12,KR1h0024_014:6b:6:4:4,KR1h0026_009:4a:3:21:12,KR1h0026_009:4b:1:9:13,KR1h0028_012:7a:11:10:24,KR1h0034_012:8a:3:10:24,KR1h0038_013:5a:5:10:24,KR1h0039_006:12a:10:21:28,KR1h0043_017:11a:4:10:23,KR2b0017_064:15b:6:15:1,KR2o0021_017:6a:5:3:23,KR3a0059_034:45a:5:10:2,KR3a0066_001:15a:7:14:8,KR3j0080_009:17a:5:19:5,KR3j0080_031:17a:5:19:226,KR3j0132_004:10b:3:21:1,KR3k0012_160:9a:11:1:32,KR3k0012_999:9a:11:1:7866,KR3k0013_785:1b:7:20:3,KR3k0025_057:23a:1:1:17,KR4d0266_092:13a:6:1:5,KR4d0398_020:10b:3:21:1

17.7佛肸召，¶
子欲往。
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-17a>¶
子路曰：¶
「昔者由也聞諸夫子曰：¶	KR1g0009_009:4a:6:15:2,KR1h0004_017:17a:2:1:11,KR1h0005_009:3b:5:4:0,KR1h0006_009:7a:4:4:8,KR1h0007_017:5a:8:1:9,KR1h0007_017:6a:1:26:9,KR1h0012_009:5a:1:10:16,KR1h0015_008:3b:1:12:4,KR1h0017_017:15b:10:10:44,KR1h0019_003:56b:9:10:269,KR1h0020_004:19b:6:10:103,KR1h0021_002:4b:10:10:16,KR1h0024_014:7b:2:29:4,KR1h0026_009:5a:10:10:16,KR1h0028_012:9b:10:4:31,KR1h0034_012:10a:10:4:32,KR1h0038_013:6a:10:4:31,KR1h0039_006:12b:1:17:28,KR1h0043_017:14a:11:4:30,KR3a0059_034:46a:6:4:2,KR3j0080_009:15b:5:12:5,KR3j0080_031:15b:5:12:226,KR5c0114_033:021a:4:14:13

17.9子曰：¶
「小子

患失之。¶

無所不至矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-28a>¶	KR1a0028_006:22b:3:3:1,KR1a0028_019:25a:8:17:1,KR1a0028_035:15a:8:16:1,KR1a0052_002:80a:6:19:580,KR1a0097_017:12a:2:21:2,KR1a0102_004:39b:3:6:0,KR1a0102_015:8a:5:9:0,KR1a0116_014:15b:4:11:13,KR1a0135_003:11a:1:4:2,KR1a0151_007:37a:3:4:0,KR1b0006_010:5b:2:13:1,KR1b0007_019:9b:2:20:1,KR1b0007_022:39b:8:9:1,KR1b0011_013:26b:5:6:1,KR1b0011_016:29b:1:1:1,KR1b0013_034:15a:2:3:0,KR1b0015_002:7a:2:14:0,KR1b0017_004:7b:8:16:10,KR1b0018_015:1a:7:9:0,KR1b0018_042:7a:1:20:0,KR1b0019_021:5a:7:14:2,KR1b0019_021:5a:8:18:2,KR1b0019_030:1b:2:11:1,KR1b0027_004:11b:2:32:16,KR1b0027_005:30a:4:33:47,KR1b0029_005:78a:4:4:76,KR1b0029_006:13b:5:6:19,KR1b0029_007:34a:2:35:56,KR1b0036_004:9a:5:14:12,KR1b0036_005:20a:7:37:29,KR1b0037_005:60b:8:14:82,KR1b0037_006:19b:3:12:30,KR1b0037_008:47b:2:17:85,KR1b0046_011:41a:2:23:62,KR1b0046_012:27a:7:1:41,KR1b0060_002:17a:3:10:5,KR1c0010_017:3a:2:13:0,KR1c0012_009:3b:6:16:0,KR1c0012_016:16a:7:8:0,KR1c0021_002:14a:4:3:44,KR1c0021_002:24b:2:10:67,KR1c0022_011:23b:2:12:10,KR1c0022_017:48a:5:7:18,KR1c0040_010:16b:7:17:2,KR1c0042_004:51a:7:29:2,KR1c0042_005:7a:5:38:2,KR1c0044_008:35a:2:15:134,KR1c0044_009:5a:2:34:28,KR1c0044_021:6a:4:27:11,KR1c0045_003:3a:5:10:6,KR1c0045_010:27b:5:4:100,KR1c0048_010:12a:8:19:2,KR1c0053_004:13a:8:5:14,KR1c0059_006:13a:3:15:70,KR1c0064_011:10a:4:9:47,KR1c0065_012:54a:4:6:104,KR1d0005_014:1a:6:19:1,KR1d0010_023:18a:5:11:29,KR1d0013_005:108a:6:18:19,KR1d0013_007:22b:3:13:0,KR1d0016_003:25b:3:20:2,KR1d0017_005:64a:3:5:2,KR1d0017_014:63b:6:20:3,KR1d0051_004:3b:3:33:31,KR1d0057_001:15b:2:12:0,KR1d0057_003:22a:6:10:0,KR1d0057_015:7b:4:15:0,KR1d0057_110:5b:2:6:0,KR1d0058_014:2a:2:14:3,KR1d0058_014:55a:2:14:12,KR1d0060_001:2b:4:40:5,KR1d0060_022:18a:1:14:6,KR1d0083_002:57b:5:11:1,KR1e0003_024:6a:9:3:13,KR1e0025_006:5a:3:2:2,KR1e0035_023:22b:2:12:244,KR1e0036_024:11b:5:23:2,KR1e0047_046:19b:3:7:2,KR1e0048_009:10a:6:26:1,KR1e0050_011:5a:2:6:1,KR1e0051_004:4b:4:1:1,KR1e0051_009:5b:8:10:1,KR1e0051_012 古之愚也直，¶	KR1d0004_014:10b:6:5:0,KR1d0005_031:11a:5:1:1,KR1g0009_009:7b:6:16:2,KR1h0004_017:17a:77:1:23,KR1h0005_009:7b:2:13:0,KR1h0006_009:13b:7:6:15,KR1h0006_009:14a:4:5:15,KR1h0007_017:11a:3:14:16,KR1h0007_017:11a:7:41:16,KR1h0012_009:7b:12:16:27,KR1h0015_008:5b:8:2:4,KR1h0017_017:29a:6:16:103,KR1h0019_003:61a:8:16:285,KR1h0020_004:21a:4:16:110,KR1h0021_002:9b:4:16:32,KR1h0024_014:11a:7:17:4,KR1h0026_009:11a:6:16:32,KR1h0028_012:20a:5:1:73,KR1h0034_012:20a:11:1:74,KR1h0038_013:11b:11:1:73,KR1h0039_003:3b:6:14:20,KR1h0039_005:37a:6:21:101,KR1h0043_017:28a:5:1:72,KR1j0019_015:1b:6:18:0,KR1j0019_035:4b:4:24:2,KR3a0009_008:9b:7:23:2,KR3k0008_027:4b:1:15:7,KR3k0008_093:20b:8:28:15,KR3k0012_494:1a:6:13:4,KR3k0012_999:1a:6:13:11960,KR3k0055_319:27a:4:3:19,KR3k0056_091:84a:1:1:2,KR3k0062_024:29b:7:3:148,KR4c0015_036:16b:6:28:21,KR4c0020_023:71b:2:13:115,KR4d0528_020:10a:5:8:9,KR4d0577_009:8a:5:11:4,KR4e0124_007:13b:6:11:17,KR6q0214_016:0081a:1:5:0,KR6q0214_017:0093b:2:5:27,KR6q0308_001:0032c:1:1:103
今之愚也詐而已矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-29a>¶	KR1g0009_009:7b:6:21:2,KR1h0004_017:17a:78:1:23,KR1h0006_009:13b:7:11:15,KR1h0007_017:11a:3:19:16,KR1h0007_017:11a:8:12:16,KR1h0012_009:7b:12:21:27,KR1h0015_008:5b:8:7:4,KR1h0017_017:29a:6:21:103,KR1h0019_003:61a:8:21:285,KR1h0020_004:21a:4:21:110,KR1h0021_002:9b:4:21:32,KR1h0024_014:11a:8:1:4,KR1h0026_009:11a:6:21:32,KR1h0028_012:20a:5:6:73,KR1h0034_012:20a:11:6:74,KR1h0038_013:11b:11:6:73,KR1h0039_003:3b:6:19:20,KR1h0039_005:37a:7:5:101,KR1h0043_017:28a:5:6:72,KR3k0030_187:1b:4:20:2,KR3k0056_091:84a:1:6:2,KR3k0060_081:14b:5:7:2

# src: LY 17.17; tr. CH
17.17子曰：¶

17.19子曰：¶

子曰：¶

今女安，¶
則為之！」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-37a>¶

# src: LY 17.21:04; tr. CH
宰我出。¶
子曰：¶

予也
有三年之愛於其父母乎！」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-38a>¶	KR1c0009_007:10b:7:1:16,KR1c0013_013:5b:4:15:12,KR1c0015_003:45a:4:11:151,KR1c0028_007:18a:1:10:101,KR1c0035_007:16b:2:2:74,KR1c0044_010:31b:1:1:123,KR1d0051_004:9a:5:4:31,KR1d0051_006:34b:8:23:29,KR1d0051_112:33b:7:16:35,KR1e0033_015:17a:4:15:3,KR1f0010_003:18a:2:7:112,KR1g0009_009:9b:8:12:2,KR1h0004_017:33a:33:3:31,KR1h0005_009:9b:4:3:0,KR1h0007_017:13b:7:20:21,KR1h0007_017:15a:1:28:21,KR1h0012_009:10a:3:2:36,KR1h0015_008:7b:4:12:4,KR1h0015_016:14b:2:10:4,KR1h0017_017:34b:9:2:125,KR1h0019_003:63a:7:2:293,KR1h0020_004:22a:9:2:117,KR1h0021_002:11b:6:2:42,KR1h0024_014:13a:5:8:4,KR1h0024_029:22b:7:18:4,KR1h0025_013:27b:3:4:4,KR1h0026_009:14a:2:2:42,KR1h0028_012:25b:6:15:96,KR1h0028_026:44a:2:5:183,KR1h0034_012:26b:5:15:97,KR1h0034_026:38a:3:5:182,KR1h0038_013:15b:11:15:96,KR1h0038_027:28a:1:5:182,KR1h0039_001:28b:9:10:124,KR1h0039_004:41b:5:2:152,KR1h0043_017:38a:4:15:95,KR1h0043_033:55a:6:5:183,KR2c0007_025:31b:6:8:6,KR2d0005_032:5b:4:1:1,KR2f0039_124:5b:5:7:2,KR3a0059_011:51a:2:15:2,KR3a0105_076:13b:3:9:95,KR3j0037_004:51a:2:5:35,KR3k0008_063:19b:2:3:19,KR3k0012_545:3b:3:1:5,KR3k0012_999:3b:3:1:12401,KR3k0013_571:6b:4:14:2,KR3k0030_064:5a:5:36:2,KR4d0102_002:21b:2:14:14,KR4d0226_008:3b:3:16:8035,KR4d0226_100:3b:3:16:4,KR4f0062_008:14b:10:8:185,KR4h0152_118:10b:2:16:12,KR6i0368_001:0488b:19:8:23,KR6i0370_001:0527b:7:22:83,KR6i0373_001:0586a:4:13:39

難矣哉！¶
不有博弈者乎？¶	KR1g0009_009:10b:5:14:2,KR1h0002_011:10b:3:19:0,KR1h0003_011:23b:2:1:26,KR1h0003_011:25a:2:17:26,KR1h0004_017:33a:38:1:32,KR1h0007_017:15b:8:14:22,KR1h0007_017:16a:2:20:22,KR1h0012_009:10b:4:7:39,KR1h0028_012:26b:9:14:98,KR1h0034_012:27b:7:14:99,KR1j0019_005:22a:1:22:9,KR1j0029_008:5a:1:31:19,KR1j0065_027:9b:8:4:7,KR3a0009_005:15a:5:35:2,KR3a0009_005:15b:2:4:2,KR3j0034_007:12a:6:6:27,KR3j0037_009:24a:2:6:20,KR3k0008_033:19a:5:8:14,KR3k0012_587:1b:2:22:4,KR3k0012_999:1b:2:22:12778,KR3k0014_009:36a:5:19:4,KR3k0056_106:65b:2:21:2,KR4d0078_017:9b:8:5:49,KR4d0136_011:8b:8:1:2,KR4f0025_041:7a:9:18:9,KR4h0003_005:20a:9:57:2,KR6s0013_031:0513a:18:23:96
為之，猶賢乎已。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_017-39a>¶	KR1b0007_029:8a:8:18:1,KR1g0009_009:10b:5:20:2,KR1h0004_017:33a:39:1:32,KR1h0006_009:19a:5:20:20,KR1h0007_017:15b:8:20:22,KR1h0012_009:10a:10:20:38,KR1h0012_009:10b:4:13:39,KR1h0015_008:8a:1:13:4,KR1h0017_007:11b:2:5:41,KR1h0017_017:38a:1:20:132,KR1h0017_031:20a:7:5:42,KR1h0019_003:63b:5:20:295,KR1h0020_004:22b:1:20:118,KR1h0021_002:12a:6:20:44,KR1h0024_014:13b:2:9:4,KR1h0034_012:27b:7:20:99,KR1h0038_013:16b:5:20:98,KR1h0039_002:23a:3:18:110,KR1h0039_004:25a:4:15:91,KR1h0043_017:41a:3:20:97,KR2a0007_064:47b:7:3:6,KR2d0006_112:58b:7:4:6,KR2g0031_002:15b:5:11:18,KR2k0049_213:24b:7:18:15,KR2k0126_041:9a:1:12:5,KR2n0011_147:26a:6:2:112,KR2n0013_000:2a:3:14:37,KR2n0017_024:3b:5:15:26,KR3a0009_005:15b:2:10:2,KR3a0047_096:12b:2:9:1,KR3a0059_003:14b:2:20:2,KR3a0059_019:24a:7:19:2,KR3a0064_034:5a:1:18:3,KR3f0013_022:1b:6:12:12,KR3h0019_002:72a:7:1:57,KR3h0033_020:8a:8:2:11,KR3h0061_092:64a:1:12:95,KR3j0014_000:83b:9:4:23,KR3j0185_101:33b:2:14:52,KR3j0185_101:42a:8:17:87,KR3j0185_101:92a:2:11:217,KR3j0185_102:68b:5:13:163,KR3j0185_102:72a:7:3:164,KR3k0004_102:4a:1:39:9,KR3k0008_033:19a:5:14:14,KR3k0012_587:1b:3:6:4,KR3k0012_754:1a:5:21:7,KR3k0012_755:3a:5:12:11,KR3k0012_999:1a:5:21:14489,KR3k0012_999:1b:3:6:12778,KR3k0012_999:3a:5:12:14507,KR3k0013_040:36a:6:18:4,KR3k0020_006:50b:2:10:17,KR3k0030_057:9b:4:22:3,KR3k0049_037:78a:2:12:20,KR3k0055_201:32a:1:9:5,KR3k0055_203:37b:7:16:9,KR3k0055_334:1a:6:6:2,KR3k0055_334:36b:1:17:7,KR4c0051_030:20a:10:232:231,KR4c0055_006:6a:8:1:3,KR4d0009_019:15b:5:27:30,KR4d0009_031:15b:5:27:1095,KR4d0114_001:22a:5:3:2,KR4d0116_007:16b:1:15:6,KR4d0132_016:20a:6:18:12,KR4d0136_011:8b:8:7:2,KR4d0348_005:18b:5:4:23,KR4d0419_010:13a:4:20:40,KR4d0464_041:1b:7:19:4,KR4d0464_043:22a:5:15:21,KR4e0114_025:34a:4:19:44,KR4e0203_016:33b:7:10:1,KR4f0025_041:7a:10:1:9,KR4h0002_056:28a:3:10:21,KR4h0022_361:6b:1:13:12,KR4h0022_679:24a:5:17:26,KR4h0024_082:10b:2:8:17,KR4h0044_015:15b:3:14:16,KR4h0058_017:13b:2:21:11,KR4h0132_ 17.23子路曰：¶
